policy.xml:
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Target Configuration Policy: "OTK openid token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Add OpenID Supported Authentication methods"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Specify a comma separated list of values with each value within double-quotes"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Example: "value01", "value02""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="NOTE: OTK currently only supports 'client_secret_basic', 'client_secret_post', 'tls_client_auth', 'self_signed_tls_client_auth'"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== Set custom values for Context Variables below ==="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== Add any new Context Variables or extensions below ==="/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
